title: Articles
text: Over the centuries, I have devoted countless hours to deciphering and translating the ancient scripts and dialects of the various peoples of Middle-earth. My goal is to gain a deeper understanding of the cultures and histories of these peoples by studying their languages. Currently, I am working on a monograph that explores the linguistic roots of the Elvish languages. Through extensive research and analysis, I hope to shed light on the connections between the different dialects of Elvish and their origins. This project has been particularly challenging, as Elvish is a complex and nuanced language, but I am determined to see it through to completion.

title: Welcome to my website!
text:
LinkedIn
  
  
    
     Email
  




Welcome to my website!
My name is Jacob E. Gardner, and I’m a MD/MPH student at Case Western Reserve University School of Medicine in Cleveland, Ohio. I’m set to graduate in Spring 2025, at which point I hope to match into a general surgery residency program. My professional and academic interests revolve around vaccine-preventable cancers and expanding vaccination efforts as a means to address domestic and global health disparities. To that end, I have been involved in research on human papillomavirus and cervical cancer among Cambodian women since 2018.
On this website, you will find a selection of my academic works, including peer-reviewed journal articles and poster presentations. You will also find news and updates on my current research projects, as well as information on upcoming events and conferences where I will be speaking. Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or would like to discuss potential projects.

title: Projects
section: The History of the War of the Ring
text:
The History of the War of the Ring

arXiv Preprint | Code
I am creating a comprehensive and detailed history of the conflict that goes beyond the surface-level events. By gathering information from a variety of sources, including my own memories, written accounts, and oral histories, I hope to shed new light on this important period in Middle-earth’s history and provide valuable insights into the motivations and actions of the various players involved.
